updater.UPDATE: Your bot is already at full power, no need to worry.
updater.NEW_UPDATE:
A new update is ready for your bot!

*Changes:*
updater.UPDATED_LOCAL: The updates have been applied, everything's in order!

global.greet2: Well, well, if it isn't you.
global.promote: A new force has arrived, whether you're ready or not.
global.pmallow:
Hii, This is Itachi Uchiha
*My skills are locked for now.
Leave a message, I’ll get back when I’m not busy.*
global.pmblock:
❌ Blocked*

Your existence is insignificant right and now Genjustu...

 _Powered by Itachi Uchiha_*
global.pmwarn:
✋Hii*
You’re testing my patience. Keep it up, and I might block you. You have ${checkPermit.times} warning(s).

 *Powered by Itachi Uchiha*
global.permited:
Hey ${tname}*

You’re allowed to message me, for now.

Powered by Itachi Uchiha
global.revoked:
Hey ${tname}*

Your privilege to message me has been revoked. You're on your own now.

Powered by Itachi Uchiha
global.demote: You’re not even worth my time anymore. Enjoy being irrelevant.
global.antlink:
Link detected.
*Farewell, your time has come to an end*
global.session:
*This is your session.itachi.json, handle with care*
_Store it properly and upload to your Forked Repo_
 Connect it to Heroku for the bot to run indefinitely.

*Powered by Itachi Uchiha*
global.title: Itachi Uchiha
global.chat_desc:
Available Options: 1. mute
2. unmute
3. archive
4. unarchive
5. read
6. unread
7. delete
global.dot: Oh, you’re still here. Why not try -help?
global.couple_male: I could have ended this long ago, but I’m letting it slide.
global.couple_female: You’re the one carrying the burden. I’ve already done my part.

global.group: Only groups can use this feature ❗
global.private: Private chats only. Keep it in your own space.⚠️
